verses.roman:
nityānanda kahe--kailuṅ tina upavāsa
āji pāraṇā karite chila baḍa āśa

synonyms: nityānanda kahe—Lord Nityānanda said; kailuṅ—I have undergone; tina—three; upavāsa—fasting days; āji—today; pāraṇā—breaking the fast; karite—to do; chila—there was; baḍa—great; āśa—hope.
translation: Nityānanda Prabhu said, "I have undergone fasting for three days continuously. Today I hoped to break My fast."
